mapper.insert: insert into grade (id, user_id, exam_id, `result`, auto_result, manul_result, create_time, update_time, `status`, answer_json) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{autoResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{manulResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{answerJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update grade set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exam_id = #{examId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `result` = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, auto_result = #{autoResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, manul_result = #{manulResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, answer_json = #{answerJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, exam_id, `result`, auto_result, manul_result, create_time, update_time, `status`, answer_json from grade where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
